structure.unit: Registration Of Certain Professions And Occupations

law.catch_line: Professional Relationships Preventing Physician From Providing Administrative Or Judicial Testimony
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2012, 224, Sec. 109 effective November 4, 2012.] No physician shall enter into a contract or agreement which creates or establishes a partnership, employment or any other form of professional relationship that prohibits a physician from providing testimony in an administrative or judicial hearing, including cases of medical malpractice.
